page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: MOST CHILDREN START SCHOOL AT THE AGE OF 5.THERE ARE 2 SCHOOLS TAKING CHILDREN OF THIS AGE IN OUR DISTRICT.{ {"BATCHLEY FIRST SCHOOL"},AND { {"HOLYOAKES FIELD FIRST SCHOOL".} YOUNGER CHILDREN MAY GO TO A PLAYGROUP,OR A NURSERY SCHOOL.AT THE AGE OF 9 CHILDREN FROM THIS AREA WILL TRANSFER TO "{BIRCHENSALE MIDDLE {SCHOOL"}.WHEN CHILDREN ARE 13 YEARS OLD THEY WILL TRANSFER TO {"BRIDLEY {MOOR HIGH SCHOOL"}.IF YOU PASS CERTAIN EXAMINATIONS YOU HAVE THE OPTION OF CONTINUING YOUR EDUCATION AT A COLLEGE,OR UNIVERSITY.WE DO NOT HAVE A UNIVERSITY IN OUR REGION,ALTHOUGH REDDITCH COLLEGE IS VERY CLOSE.IN OUR FIRST SCHOOL WE LEARN MATHEMATICS,ENGLISH,READING,SCIENCE,MU SIC,ART AND CRAFT,DANCING,RECORDERS,PHYSICAL EDUCATION etc.
